raiseActionButtons.title: Raise action buttons
raiseActionButtons.description: This option highlights action buttons (such as "Warn User", "Okay", "Submit") so that they are easier to distinguish from other buttons.

revertDoneOption.title: Post-rollback action
revertDoneOption.description: The action to take after reverting an edit by a user.

revertMethod.title: Revert method
revertMethod.description: The method of rollback to use. Rollback requires the rollback right, but is much faster than a standard undo. Psuedo-rollback (or "rollback-like") requires no special rights, but is slower than rollback (significantly for slower connections).

noticeOrder.title: Notice template order
noticeOrder.description: You can sort notice templates by their title (e.g. "Vandalism"), or by their template name (e.g. uw-vandalism).
